text: Yadi timi uniharula'i pukardachau bhane uniharu timro pukara sunne chainan. Ra yadi (manili'um) suni pani halechan bhane timro kurala'i svikara garna sakne chainan ra kiyamatako dina uniharule timro yasa sirka thahara'une kurobata inkara garnechan, ra tapa'inla'i kasaile allaha jhaim khabaraharu dinechaina
